condor_negotiator 9614/tcp # Condor daemon condor_collector 9618/tcp # Condor daemon
### Create the Condor User #condor:x:407:407:Condor Daemon Account:/home/condor:/bin/bash #condor:x:404:404:Owner of Condor Daemons:/var/lib/condor:/sbin/nologin #/usr/sbin/useradd -u 407 -g 407 -c "Condor Daemon Account" -s /bin/bash -d /home/condor condor ### Make sure is the same as condor roll in case disabling condor roll/enabling osg roll
swapgid=`getent group condor | cut -d: -f3` swapgroup=`getent group &OSG_condorgid; | cut -d: -f1` [ ! -z "$swapgroup" ]&&[ "x$swapgroup" != "xcondor" ]&&/usr/sbin/groupmod -o -g $swapgid $swapgroup /usr/sbin/groupmod -g &OSG_condorgid; condor
swapuid=`getent passwd condor | cut -d: -f3` swapuser=`getent passwd &OSG_condoruid; | cut -d: -f1` [ ! -z "$swapuser" ]&&[ "x$swapuser" != "xcondor" ]&&/usr/sbin/usermod -o -u $swapuid $swapuser /usr/sbin/usermod -u &OSG_condoruid; -g &OSG_condorgid; condor
chown -R condor:condor /var/log/condor chown -R condor:condor /var/run/condor chown -R condor:condor /var/lib/condor chown -R condor:condor /var/lock/condor
/bin/mkdir -p /var/lib/condor/cred_dir
